title: Tasty Soupy Chicken Curry Recipe
content:
The delicious soupy chicken curry which tastes so delicious with some hot rice or some Paratha or roti. This can be made using nattu kozhi chicken as well.

This is a simple chicken curry made using fresh spices. This chicken dish is so easy to make, you need basic ingredients. If you use small chicken pieces then it will be tastier. It has a little saucy texture and tastes amazing.

 

Soupy Chicken Curry Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 50 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Coconut Oil - 3 tablespoon

Onion - 2 large

Garlic - 5 cloves

Tomato - 2 large pureed

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Coriander Powder - 1 tablespoon

Cumin Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Black Pepper Powder - 1 teaspoon

Chicken - 500 grams

Coriander Leaves - 3 tablespoons chopped finely

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pressure cooker.

Grind onion and garlic till coarse.

Add in onion puree and saute for 5 mins.

Add in the tomato puree and cook till raw smell leaves.

Add in spice powders and salt and mix well.

Add in chicken and mix well.

Add water and cover and cook for 2 whistles for normal chicken and 6 whistles for country chicken.

Take it off the heat and let the steam escape by itself.

Add in pepper powder and coriander leaves.

Serve it over rice.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken ( Using Leftover ) Salad Sandwich Recipe
recommendations.content:
A delicious creamy salad which taste so delicious. This chicken salad is easy to make and makes a great filling for sandwiches too. It tastes so yummy cold so it is perfect for summer.

recommendations.title: Tasty Methi ( Fenugreek Leaves ) Chicken Recipe
recommendations.content:
A super fragrant and tasty chicken dish made using methi leaves. This chicken dish tastes great with rice, roti, phulka as well.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Burger Recipe
recommendations.content:
The delicious and juicy chicken burger which is not only tasty but is super easy to make. This burger makes a great lunch or dinner.
The super delicious spicy burger which is perfect to pack in a lunch box or taste amazing for dinner too.
 
Chicken Burger Recipe

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
